job_info.title: Principal Software Engineer - Copilot
job_info.description:
Work on Microsoft Copilot to bring AI assistance to millions of users.
                Build the future of AI-powered productivity tools.
requirements: Experience with LLMs and AI applications
Background in developer tools or productivity software

highlights: CureAgent framework, Executor-Analyst architecture, tool-augmented reasoning
Deployed Ollama, llama.cpp, vllm, TensorRT-LLM, mlc-llm
